Name: SurveyMonkey

Methods.Name: Create Collector
Methods.Description: Create a collector for a survey.

Methods.Name: List Collectors by Survey ID
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Collectors specific to a survey.

Methods.Name: Get Templates
Methods.Description: Retrieve a list of templates provided by SurveyMonkey.

Methods.Name: List New And Updated Surveys
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of surveys updated in a user's account since last successful run.

Methods.Name: List Surveys
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of surveys in a user's account.

Methods.Name: Get Survey Details
Methods.Description: Retrieves a survey's metadata.  Note that this only works for Surveys upder 200 pages and with less than 1,000 questions.

Methods.Name: Get Survey Response Data
Methods.Description: Returns a list of responses and the data from those responses. An annual paid SurveyMonkey account is required for this. Custom fields must be added for the response.

Methods.Name: List Responses by Collector ID
Methods.Description: Returns a list of responses by a specific collector.

MetaTile: SurveyMonkey Integration - Marketing & Support Automation - Cyclr
MetaDescription: Connect your SurveyMonkey account to your CRM, Marketing & support systems to create automation workflows that take the pain out of data management.
